# `r pal::desc_value("Package")`

```{r}
#| label: pkg-desc
#| results: asis
#| echo: false

pal::cat_lines(paste0("[![CRAN Status](https://r-pkg.org/badges/version/", pal::desc_value(key = "Package"), ")](https://cran.r-project.org/package=",
                      pal::desc_value(key = "Package"), "){.pkgdown-release}"),
               "",
               pal::desc_value("Description") |> stringr::str_replace("(Centre for Democracy Studies Aarau \\(ZDA\\))",
                                                                      "[\\1](https://www.zdaarau.ch/en/)"))
```

## RDB data model

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: !expr '!isTRUE(getOption("pal.build_readme.is_pkgdown"))'
#| results: asis

# for default README output, we just link to the raw SVG file on GitLab
pal::git_remote_tree_url() |>
  stringr::str_replace(pattern = stringr::fixed("/tree/"),
                       replacement = "/raw/") |>
  paste0("man/figures/rdb_dm.svg") %>%
  paste0("![RDB data model diagram](", ., ")") |>
  cat()
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: !expr 'isTRUE(getOption("pal.build_readme.is_pkgdown"))'
#| results: asis

# for pkgdown output, we directly embed a modified version of the SVG
brio::read_file("man/figures/rdb_dm.svg") |>
  # remove XML file header
  stringr::str_remove(pattern = "^(.|\\n)+?(?=<svg[\\s>])") |>
  # adjust dimensions to avoid overflow
  stringr::str_replace(pattern = "width=\".+?\"",
                       replacement = "width=\"776px\"") |>
  stringr::str_replace(pattern = "height=\".+?\"",
                       replacement = "height=\"100%\"") %>%
  paste("<a href='reference/figures/rdb_dm.svg' title='RDB data model diagram'>", ., "</a>",
        sep = "\n") |>
  cat()
```
